apis.description: Get a list of all submissions for this quiz. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

operations.notes: Get a list of all submissions for this quiz. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Associations to include with the quiz submission.

apis.description: Get a single quiz submission. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

operations.notes: Get a single quiz submission. 200 OK response code is returned if the request was successful.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Associations to include with the quiz submission.

apis.description: Start taking a Quiz by creating a QuizSubmission which you can use to answer questions and submit your answers. Responses * 200 OK if the request was successful * 400 Bad Request if the quiz is locked * 403 Forbidden if an invalid access code is specified * 403 Forbidden if the Quiz's IP filter restriction does not pass * 409 Conflict if a QuizSubmission already exists for this user and quiz

operations.summary: Create the quiz submission (start a quiz-taking session)
operations.notes: Start taking a Quiz by creating a QuizSubmission which you can use to answer questions and submit your answers. Responses * 200 OK if the request was successful * 400 Bad Request if the quiz is locked * 403 Forbidden if an invalid access code is specified * 403 Forbidden if the Quiz's IP filter restriction does not pass * 409 Conflict if a QuizSubmission already exists for this user and quiz

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: Access code for the Quiz, if any.

parameters.name: preview
parameters.description: Whether this should be a preview QuizSubmission and not count towards the user's course record. Teachers only.

apis.description: Update the amount of points a student has scored for questions they've answered, provide comments for the student about their answer(s), or simply fudge the total score by a specific amount of points. Responses * 200 OK if the request was successful * 403 Forbidden if you are not a teacher in this course * 400 Bad Request if the attempt parameter is missing or invalid * 400 Bad Request if the specified QS attempt is not yet complete

operations.summary: Update student question scores and comments.
operations.notes: Update the amount of points a student has scored for questions they've answered, provide comments for the student about their answer(s), or simply fudge the total score by a specific amount of points. Responses * 200 OK if the request was successful * 403 Forbidden if you are not a teacher in this course * 400 Bad Request if the attempt parameter is missing or invalid * 400 Bad Request if the specified QS attempt is not yet complete

parameters.name: attempt
parameters.description: The attempt number of the quiz submission that should be updated. This attempt MUST be already completed.

parameters.name: fudge_points
parameters.description: Amount of positive or negative points to fudge the total score by.

parameters.name: questions
parameters.description: A set of scores and comments for each question answered by the student. The keys are the question IDs, and the values are hashes of `score` and `comment` entries. See {Appendix: Manual Scoring} for more on this parameter.

apis.description: Complete the quiz submission by marking it as complete and grading it. When the quiz submission has been marked as complete, no further modifications will be allowed. Responses * 200 OK if the request was successful * 403 Forbidden if an invalid access code is specified * 403 Forbidden if the Quiz's IP filter restriction does not pass * 403 Forbidden if an invalid token is specified * 400 Bad Request if the QS is already complete * 400 Bad Request if the attempt parameter is missing * 400 Bad Request if the attempt parameter is not the latest attempt

operations.summary: Complete the quiz submission (turn it in).
operations.notes: Complete the quiz submission by marking it as complete and grading it. When the quiz submission has been marked as complete, no further modifications will be allowed. Responses * 200 OK if the request was successful * 403 Forbidden if an invalid access code is specified * 403 Forbidden if the Quiz's IP filter restriction does not pass * 403 Forbidden if an invalid token is specified * 400 Bad Request if the QS is already complete * 400 Bad Request if the attempt parameter is missing * 400 Bad Request if the attempt parameter is not the latest attempt

parameters.name: attempt
parameters.description: The attempt number of the quiz submission that should be completed. Note that this must be the latest attempt index, as earlier attempts can not be modified.

parameters.name: validation_token
parameters.description: The unique validation token you received when this Quiz Submission was created.

parameters.name: access_code
parameters.description: Access code for the Quiz, if any.

id.description: The ID of the quiz submission.

quiz_id.description: The ID of the Quiz the quiz submission belongs to.

user_id.description: The ID of the Student that made the quiz submission.

submission_id.description: The ID of the Submission the quiz submission represents.

started_at.description: The time at which the student started the quiz submission.

finished_at.description: The time at which the student submitted the quiz submission.

end_at.description: The time at which the quiz submission will be overdue, and be flagged as a late submission.

attempt.description: For quizzes that allow multiple attempts, this field specifies the quiz submission attempt number.

extra_attempts.description: Number of times the student was allowed to re-take the quiz over the multiple-attempt limit.

extra_time.description: Amount of extra time allowed for the quiz submission, in seconds.

time_spent.description: Amount of time spent, in seconds.

score.description: The score of the quiz submission, if graded.

score_before_regrade.description: The original score of the quiz submission prior to any re-grading.

kept_score.description: For quizzes that allow multiple attempts, this is the score that will be used, which might be the score of the latest, or the highest, quiz submission.

fudge_points.description: Number of points the quiz submission's score was fudged by.

workflow_state.description: The current state of the quiz submission. Possible values: ['untaken'|'pending_review'|'complete'|'settings_only'|'preview'].
